title: [High Plains, Old Barrow Road]
description: A brisk, steady wind blows over the plain, swirling odd bits of grass and leaves across the ancient road and bending the rough patches of brambles and heather that dot the surrounding plain in an eternal slant.  Parallel lines of crumbled stone that once were walls stretch to the north, marking the edges of the rutted road.

A brisk, chill night wind blows over the plain, bending the dark patches of brambles and heather that dot the surrounding plain in an eternal slant.  Parallel lines of crumbled stone stretch to the north, marking the edges of the rutted road.
